# WeAddBots

> AI automation consulting for established small and mid-sized businesses.
> We help business owners remove daily operational friction with simple,
> AI-powered automations — layered on top of existing systems.
>
> AI is the great equalizer. For the first time, the business you built is
> no longer limited by the resources you wished you had. Every business now
> has access to an unlimited number of skilled team members ready to help
> achieve its goals. WeAddBots helps put that team to work — practically,
> without the hype, and without ripping out what's already working.

## Key Pages
- [Home](https://weaddbots.com/) - AI automation consulting overview for Memphis businesses
- [Services](https://weaddbots.com/services) - AI automation services: lead response, task automation, smart workflows. Pricing, process, and tools.
- [About](https://weaddbots.com/about) - Founder Scott Finney's story and the WeAddBots approach to AI democratization
- [Events](https://weaddbots.com/events/memphis-ai-meetup) - Free in-person Memphis AI Meetups for local business owners (weekly, rotating locations)
- [Contact](https://weaddbots.com/contact) - Free AI assessment and discovery call booking

## Positioning
Primary: AI automation consulting for established small and mid-sized businesses, based in Memphis TN, serving US businesses
Approach: Layer lightweight automations on existing systems — a rip-and-replace is not usually the first recommendation
Differentiator: Local, practical, fast results (a week or two, not months)
Philosophy: AI has leveled the playing field — the same capabilities Fortune 500 companies spend millions on are now accessible to any business
Founder: Scott Finney — software engineer turned AI automation specialist, Memphis community leader

## Key Services
- Lead Response Automation: AI-powered instant responses to inquiries within 60 seconds, 24/7
- Task Automation: Eliminate repetitive manual tasks draining team time
- Smart Workflows: Connect existing tools with intelligent automation, no painful migrations
- Rebecca AI Receptionist: AI-powered receptionist that handles inbound calls, gathers information, qualifies leads ($297-$497/month)

## Pricing
- Free AI assessment
- $300/hr strategy sessions
- Custom projects from $2k
- Rebecca AI Receptionist: $297-$497/month
- No retainers unless results warrant it

## Tools & Platforms
GoHighLevel, Zapier, Make, Gumloop, Google Workspace, Salesforce, Calendly, Canva, Read.ai, Stripe

## Authority Signals
- Weekly in-person Memphis AI Meetups host (rotating locations across Memphis metro)
- 5-year AI Bot Summit attendee
- Page Robbins Adult Day Center board member
- GiveCamp Memphis multi-year volunteer
- 10+ years software engineering
- Auburn University graduate
